import React from "react"; import Subheading from "./subheading"; import ContactLabel from "./contactLabel"; import contactUsLabelData from "../contactUsLabelData"; function ContactUs(){ const iframeStyle={ border:0, width: "100%", height: "290 px" } function FetchContactData(eachLabel){ return( ); } return(
{contactUsLabelData.map(FetchContactData)} {/*

Location:

A108 Adam Street, New York, NY 535022

info@example.com

+1 5589 55488 55s

*/}
Loading
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
); } export default ContactUs;
